Core¶

Helper Functions Module¶

ledsa.core.led_helper.add_search_areas_to_plot(search_areas, ax, config)¶

Add circles for every search area to a pyplot axis object.

ledsa.core.led_helper.create_fit_result_file(img_data, img_id, channel)¶

Save img_data.

ledsa.core.led_helper.create_imgs_to_process_file()¶

Creats a temporary file with all image filenames

ledsa.core.led_helper.create_needed_directories(channels)¶

Create all directories.

ledsa.core.led_helper.find_not_analysed_imgs(channel)¶

Find all images which are not yet processed and update images_to_process.csv accordingly

ledsa.core.led_helper.find_search_areas(image, window_radius=10, skip=10, threshold_factor=0.25)¶

Use a default image to find the position of all leds.

Return type

ndarray

ledsa.core.led_helper.generate_analysis_data(img_filename, channel, search_areas, array_indices, conf, fit_leds=True, debug=False, debug_led_id=0)¶

Extract and save all infos for every led belonging to one of the given arrays and the given channel from the image.

fit_leds turns fitting of the light distribution per led on or off.

debug allows to extract infos of only a single led.

Return type

List[LEDAnalysisData]

ledsa.core.led_helper.generate_image_infos_csv(config, build_experiment_infos=False, build_analysis_infos=False)¶

Generate csv file with information about every image.

ledsa.core.led_helper.generate_labeled_led_arrays_plot(led_ids_per_array, search_areas)¶

Plot the labeled leds.

ledsa.core.led_helper.generate_line_indices_files(led_ids_per_array)¶

Save the led ids for each array in a sperate file.

ledsa.core.led_helper.get_img_id(img_name)¶

Convert an image name string to the corresponding id.

Return type

int

ledsa.core.led_helper.get_img_id_from_time(time)¶

Find the image corresponding to the given experiment time in seconds.

Return type

int

ledsa.core.led_helper.get_img_name(img_id)¶

Convert an image id to the image name string.

Return type

str

ledsa.core.led_helper.get_last_img_id()¶

Find the last image id of the experiment.

Return type

int

ledsa.core.led_helper.get_time_from_img_id(img_id)¶

Find the experiment time in seconds of the given image.

Return type

int

ledsa.core.led_helper.match_leds_to_led_arrays(search_areas, config)¶

Find for each led line array the corresponding leds.

Return a list with length equals the number of led arrays, each entry containing a list with the corresponding led ids.

Return type

List[List[int]]

ledsa.core.led_helper.read_file(filename, channel, colordepth=14)¶

Return a 2D array of channel values depending on the colordepth. 8bit is default range for JPG. Bayer array is a 2D array where all channel values except the selected channel are masked.

ledsa.core.led_helper.request_config_parameters(config)¶

Ask the user to input all config data which does not depend on calculations and are not already set.
